description: The Gregory Normare Coastal Walking Trail circumnavigates most of Bell Island. It is 24 km in total but can be walked in sections.This section starts from the ferry dock and heads north to the lighthouse.
directions: From the ferry dock, the sign for the trail is visible.  It starts up a wooden staircase to an observation deck.  At the deck, cross the Beach Hill road and look for an ATV trail.
title: Gregory Normore Coastal Walking Trail
